features.name: Event Management System
features.description: Complete event creation, management, and registration system with admin dashboard

features.name: User Authentication & Profiles
features.description: Clerk-based authentication with user profile management and social login

features.name: Admin Dashboard & Navigation
features.description: Comprehensive admin interface with navigation and management tools

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Stripe payment processing for event tickets and subscriptions

features.name: API Layer & Data Management
features.description: RESTful API endpoints with JWT authentication and proxy handlers

features.name: Event Registration & Ticketing
features.description: Event registration forms, guest management, and QR code generation

features.name: UI Components & Styling
features.description: Reusable UI components with Tailwind CSS and Radix UI primitives

features.name: Data Transfer Objects & Types
features.description: TypeScript interfaces and DTOs for type-safe data handling

features.name: Server Actions & API Integration
features.description: Next.js server actions for backend API communication

features.name: Multi-tenant Architecture
features.description: Tenant-based data isolation and management system

features.name: Event Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Dashboard analytics, registration tracking, and data visualization

features.name: Search & Filtering
features.description: Advanced search and filtering capabilities for events and registrations

features.name: QR Code & Check-in System
features.description: QR code generation for event tickets and check-in functionality

features.name: Email & Notification System
features.description: Email templates and notification system for event communications

features.name: Media Management
features.description: File upload and media management for events and content
